document.full_text: washington imposed sanctions on syrian president bashar al-assad and other senior officials on wednesday in a dramatic escalation of pressure on syria to halt a violent crackdown on pro-democracy protests.
document.title: u.s. imposes sanctions on syria's assad
lines_and_colors: washington imposed sanctions on syrian president bashar al-assad and other senior officials on wednesday in a dramatic escalation of pressure on syria to halt a violent crackdown on pro-democracy protests.
